title: 2D-based electrode materials for supercapacitors – status, challenges, and prospects
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32958-32977
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05473C, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
H. H. Hegazy, Junaid Khan, Noshaba Shakeel, Eman A. Alabdullkarem, Muhammad Imran Saleem, Hussein Alrobei, I. S. Yahia
To address the inherent challenges such as restacking, limited ion-accessibility, scalability, stability, and the intricate balance between surface area and conductivity, this article delves into emerging strategies and prospects.
